history.narrative: Law 6-11 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-174, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 30, 1985, and May 14, 1985, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 30, 1985, it was assigned Act No. 6-25 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
